name: House of Hunger
description:
Content Warning: This game contains jump scares and may not be suitable for people with weak hearts, people that don't like jump scares, people who faint, or any combination thereof. 

--------------------

You've been captured by a reptilian monster who is forcing you to help them cook. In this short horror game, you will promptly deliver the requested ingredients or else it might be you who is on the menu!

--------------------

This game was created by 1armen and Rupert_Spore. If you like the content, please consider leaving a rating and a comment.
